text:
Uniform Teeth » Remote or SF » Full Time » https://www.uniformteeth.com

We're a healthcare startup that's modernizing a hugely antiquated market. Think one Medical for Orthodontics.

We're building our own EMR, our own apps for patient communication, and our own manufacturing pipelines. Come work on it all! That means API, process engineering, scheduling, healthcare, real time chat, data, mobile, and UI.

If you're:

- Full stack

- Backend (go, ruby)

- Frontend (redux, react-native)

You'll have responsibility and sway in terms of how things are built. You're joining an INCREDIBLE team of people from healthcare — fast, nimble engineering, the best medical team in SF/USA, incredible ops from healthcare, incredible marketing.

Hit me up: tony@uniformteeth.com
